category-def.name: ptolemy
category-def.label: Ptolemy II Modeling and Simulation Engine
category-def.description: Ptolemy II is an open-source software framework supporting experimentation with actor-oriented design. Actors are software components that execute concurrently and communicate through messages sent via interconnected ports. A model is a hierarchical interconnection of actors. In Ptolemy II, the semantics of a model is not determined by the framework, but rather by a software component in the model called a director, which implements a model of computation. Ptolemy II is used by Triquetrum.
